description: Collect all artifact values that match the desired CEF data types, such as "ip", "url", "sha1", or "all". Optionally also filter for artifacts that have the specified tags.

inputs.description: The CEF data type to collect values for. This could be a single string or a comma separated list such as "hash,filehash,file_hash". The special value "all" can also be used to collect all field values from all artifacts.
inputs.name: data_types

inputs.description: If tags are provided, only return fields from artifacts that have all of the provided tags. This could be an individual tag or a comma separated list.
inputs.name: tags

outputs.description: The value of the field with the matching CEF data type.
ID of the artifact that contains the value.
